summary: 2012 CHRYSLER TOWN & COUNTRY.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO REAR BRAKE PROBLEMS.  *SMD  THE CONSUMER STATED THE PROBLEM WAS THE REAR BRAKES WEARING OUT BEFORE OR AT THE SAME TIME AS THE FRONT BRAKES. THE REAR CALIPERS FAILED AND CAUSED THE REAR PADS TO BECOME METAL-TO-METAL AND LOCKED UP THE ROTORS.  *JB  UPDATED 10/01/14
